numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice that the WNBA is popular.
2. I notice that the NBA is popular.
3. The WNBA has a large percentage.
4. The NBA has a large percentage.
5. I wonder why the WNBA is the most popular.
6. I wonder why the NBA is the most popular.
7. I wonder why other sports are not the most popular.
9. This shows that black people do not have an opportunity to be a coach.
10. This shows a percentage difference between black coaches.
11. The headline is: When will these sport coaches have equality?
